ooC: Sorry peeps, I've been out of it for the last few days... I 
need someone to kick me... several times. Maybe too much watching of 
anime is eating away at my brain... naw, you can never watch too 
much anime. lol =p

-- Megatron / Switchblade --

Megatron catches the comm message, and replies, "I'll check on it 
later. When you're done, come to the countrol room. Megatron out." 

He stops for a second, then opens a commlink to Quickstrike who 
should have finished fixing the storage bay by now. "Quickstrike, 
where are you right now? Come to the control room if you've finished 
your last task."

Megs closes that comm, and opens another, this time to Proto and 
Destructor, "Proto, Destructor come to the control room."

He closes the commlink and then sits back in his chair. "Hmmm... 
base defenses are insufficient, I must find some way to deal with 
Galvatron, and a counter offensive attack at either the Tripred 
base, or the Maximal base." the Pred leader thinks out loud to 
himself.

-----------------------------

Switchblades CR chamber nears completion of his repairs. Due to the 
sever damage however, some of the fixing would need to be done 
manually by Switchblade himself.
